channel.title: Advanced Topics :: CIS 526 Textbook
channel.description: This set of milestones is all about building a RESTful API and interface for the Lost Kansas Communities project. Milestone 7 - Advanced Topics Building from the previous milestone, expand upon the starter project by adding the following features: Metadata List View - add a view to show all metadata available in the application. You MAY NOT use the PrimeVue DataTable component for this. Instead, develop your own method to display these items (for example, consider using the PrimeVue DataView along with your own custom component for showing each individual metadata item).
